Module jGame
Package jGame.core.utils

Interface MathUtils.ReduceLambda

Enclosing class:
MathUtils
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public static interface MathUtils.ReduceLambda
Represents an operation that can be applied to 2 numbers. Usually used in conjunction with the 'reduce' method.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static MathUtils.ReduceLambda PRODUCT_INT
    Product of 2 integer values.
    static MathUtils.ReduceLambda SUBTRACTION_INT
    Difference of 2 integer values.
    static MathUtils.ReduceLambda SUM_INT
    Sum between 2 integer values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Accepts 2 numbers as input and return a number as an output.
